title: high privileged user
extract: Privileged and services accounts are a significant risk because of the access they provide the user with access to an organization's systems and data. These accounts can be used to access the most sensitive data, lock out legitimate users, and create ghost accounts and backdoors that are not easily seen.Oct 4, 2017
extract_html: Privileged and services accounts are a significant risk because of the access they provide the user with access to an organization's systems and data. These accounts can be used to access the most sensitive data, lock out legitimate users, and create ghost accounts and backdoors that are not easily seen.Oct 4, 2017
